overview: The Greatest Truth Never Told is a film that has been 7 years in research and development & is centered around the truth that humanity has been enslaved over and over again throughout history.  It lays out the case for even the most cynical and indoctrinated individual.
tagline: The paradigm which we operate under is mathematically going to end. The end of the world as we know it does not mean it is the end of the world.
title: The Greatest Truth Never Told
